name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LinkedIn Automation Tool for Prospecting & Lead Generation: Leadseeder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best LinkedIn automation tool for bulk sending invitations and messages. LinkedIn sales navigator and Recruiter support.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Leadseeder is a LinkedIn automation tool made to boost your LinkedIn networking and supercharge your lead generation by up to 3X while saving up to 10 hours/week. Best free alternative to prospecting tools like Waalaxy, Octopus CRM, Dux-Soup and Scrab.in.

Key Features:

üîó Automated Connection Requests: Automatically send bulk personalised connection requests on LinkedIn to 200+ prospects in a week with an average conversion rate of 52%. This feature allows you to connect with your prospects on LinkedIn.

üí¨ Personalised Messaging: Automate LinkedIn bulk messaging with personalised templates. You can use variables such as {FirstName} and {Location} to personalise your messages. Create customized sequence and add messages after sending a connection request directly with an option of delay (1-20 days) between each action. 

Examples: 

{Invitation + message + message}
{Invitation + message + delay + visit + message}
{Visit + delay + Invitation + message + delay + message} etc.

üëÄ Profile Visits: Increase your visibility by automatically visiting profiles, encouraging more visits to your own profile. This feature allows you to engage with your prospects which builds trust. PS: Users love this feature ‚ù§Ô∏è

üë• Importing prospects into Leadseeder: You can import potential customers into Leadseeder's dashboard in seven ways to launch an automation campaign. These methods include importing from LinkedIn search bar results, importing first-degree connections, LinkedIn group members, LinkedIn event attendees, a CSV file, from Sales Navigator, and from Recruiter.

üìä Track Your Lead Generation Campaign: Analyze and optimize your LinkedIn activities with our dashboard, which provides detailed analytics for your lead generation campaigns. See how many invitations have been sent, messages delivered, responses from prospects, profiles you've visited, and how many have visited your profile, among other insights.

üòé Smart reply detection: Automatically detects when a prospect replies to your message and instantly removes them from the automated campaign sequence.

Why choose Leadseeder over other LinkedIn Automation Tools?

1) Custom marketing workflows: Unlike Waalaxy, Leadseeder allows you to create your own marketing funnel - add as many messages, visits to the sequence. Tailored specifically to your needs for engaging with prospects efficiently.

2) Data Export in CSV/Excel: Easily import profiles from CSV files and export your prospect lists in CSV or Excel format, allowing you to leverage data from other marketing tools like zapier, hubspot, salesforce. 

3) Different Importing options: Import profiles from LinkedIn Groups, Events, searches on LinkedIn, individual profiles, or even CSV files, providing you with multiple ways to build your prospect list. Leadseeder comes with LinkedIn Sales Navigator support and LinkedIn Recruiter support.

4) Smart Networking: Refine your LinkedIn prospecting and lead generation strategies by analyzing campaign insights through the dashboard analytics.

5) Safer - It's recommended to use LinkedIn Premium accounts for LinkedIn automation. If your account is relatively new but you have a Premium subscription, you can still safely use LinkedIn automation.

Contact Support:

For any assistance, reach out to us at: vidit@leadseeder.co

{Leadseeder is designed for Marketers, Salespeople, Recruiters, LinkedIn Automation Experts, LinkedIn Influencers, Founders, Entrepreneurs, Lead Generation Experts, Lead Generation Agencies, and Real Estate Agents. Everyone who thinks their customers are on LinkedIn, Leadseeder can help you harness it's potential and streamline your outreach efforts}
